attributes.action: Give the UK a properly considered EU referendum based on researched information.
attributes.additional_details:
We demand a second EU referendum. This time we want a proper campaign. We want it to be filled with considered research regarding consequences and an exit plan.

To exit the EU is too important a decision to make based on a shambles of a 7 week campaign filled with admitted lies, false promises and political games. Both sides behaved appallingly and the outcome has been recognised as not ideal.We deserve the right to make an informed decision and it's your job and duty to give us this chance.
attributes.background: We are Leave voters. We are remain voters. We are voters who deserve a real EU referendum. We deserve a second chance for you to do this properly and to be held accountable for the mess that you, as politicians, have created for this country
